thread.section_title: Technology - Internet Related Businesses For Sale in the US
thread.title: Kitchen & Coffee Products Ecommerce Brand

title: Kitchen & Coffee Products Ecommerce Brand
text: Questions Business Summary Well established, 4 year old online retailer focused on developing and third party manufacturing Coffee and Kitchen products to sell through various eCommerce channels. 100% of orders utilizing FBA (Fulfillment by Amazon). Good standing relationships with 10 suppliers. Vendor contracts can be transferred anywhere within the U.S. Over 94,000 customers available for marketing in current database. Current operation requires just a small office to operate business. The business is highly automated from manufacturing to virtual warehousing. Product line focused on providing high quality products at affordable prices, while focusing on best in class customer service. Numerous potential growth opportunities include adding additional products offered by the manufacturer, PPC Marketing, Easy expansion to eBay, Newegg, Sears.com, Walmart, BB&B, Jet.com, Rakuten and other online CPA comparison shopping engines and networks. Create an aggressive email marketing campaign to current database. Strong transitional support provided based on the specific needs of the buyer. Business can be operated anywhere in the U.S. Owners are selling to raise capital to pursue other (unrelated) business ventures. Financials
